title: Portal Goes Live
summary: Raya’s first digital home is online — a place to follow the journey, explore experiments, and connect with the community.

title: Q/A Layer Prototype Released
summary: The first version of Raya’s Question/Answer system goes live, combining Wikipedia + caching for faster responses.

title: Vision Statement Finalized
summary: Raya’s roadmap is drafted: evolving from simple Q/A to a self-learning AI ecosystem with Type-1 Civilization aesthetics.
